original_title: Sons Of Apollo: Live With The Plovdiv Psychotic Symphony
overview: Filmed at the spectacular Roman Amphitheatre in Plovdiv, Bulgaria on September 22 2018. The band's performance was divided into two sets, the second of which saw them joined by a full orchestra and choir.
tagline: “Fuck the term ‘supergroup’, that’s not what this is about. Sons of Apollo are simply a group that are super.” – Classic Rock
title: Sons of Apollo: Live With The Plovdiv Psychotic Symphony
